attributes.action: stop this person from entering england as he is allegedly training in the uk for jihad on our troops/in our lands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: http://www.timesonline.co.uk/tol/news/world/ireland/article6917485.ece  the times online reports Khalid Kelly a known anjem choudry accomplace to be be currently training in the uk in the use of weapons m16 rifles.. its also reported that he would gladly train his children to fight in the same cause of jihad .. which should also be taken serious by the social services for the protection of his children
